refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: average The avg operator finds the average value of an array attribute.

refsect1.title: Inputs
refsect1.para:
The avg operator takes the following arguments:
array: A source array with one or more attributes and one or more dimensions.
attribute: Optional attribute. If no attribute is provided, the first attribute in the source array is used.
dimension_n: An optional list of dimensions to group by.

informalexample.para: This example finds the average value along the second dimension of a 4×4 array.

step.para:
Create an array named avg_array:
AQL% CREATE ARRAY avg_array<val:double>[i=0:3,4,0,j=0:3,4,0];

Find the average value along the dimension j:
AFL% aggregate(avg_array,avg(val),j);{j} val_avg {0} 6 {1} 7 {2} 8 {3} 9
